template: One day, Little {} Riding Hood was going through the forest carrying a basket of {} for her grandmother. Suddenly, she met a big {} wolf.'{}!' said the wolf. When Miss Riding Hood got to her grandmother's house, the wolf was in bed dressed like her grandmother. 'My Grandmother' she said. 'What big {} you have.'
